Televizijec, ki si zapomni 3141 decimalk števila π (pi)
Na tekmovanja iz pomnjenja se običajno pripravlja približno dva tedna.
02 Nov 2019, 16:38 by D. V.



Rad žonglira. FOTO: OSEBNI ARHIV



Igralec, voditelj ... FOTO: MMCRTV



Igralca Pavla Ravnohriba so "podstavili". FOTO: RTV SLO



Državni prvak v pomnjenju. FOTO: OSEBNI ARHIV


Male sive celice, slovenski televizijski kviz za otroke in mladostnike, so vstopile v 26. leto predvajanja. Oddajo, ki je pravcati hit med mladimi, je do 2016. vodil igralec Pavle Ravnohrib, ki je padel v nemilost vodilnih na RTV SLO zaradi nekaterih svojih nazorov, predvsem pa angažiranja v referendumski kampanji proti sprejemu novele zakona o zakonski zvezi in družinskih razmerjih. Od sezone 2016/17 kviz vodi dramski igralec Nik Škrlec.»V čast mi je, da sem bil povabljen k sodelovanju pri Malih sivih celicah, in komaj čakam, da zares začnemo. To je moja prva tovrstna vloga, tako da bo zame vznemirljivo in gotovo pestro – stavim na iskrenost in radovedne, bistre tekmovalce! Obožujem izzive, domišljijo in znanje, če bom to lahko prenesel do tekmovalcev in gledalcev, je moja naloga opravljena,« je takrat dejal novi voditelj in sčasoma postal navdihujoči idol najstnikov.
Vozi kontracikl, žonglira, hodi po vrvi, obvlada diabolo in ravnotežno lestev.
Uri možgane in razgibava telo


Igralec, voditelj ... FOTO: MMCRTV

Nik je sicer iz Posavja (Brestanica), je dramski igralec in režiser ter aktiven na različnih gledaliških odrih. Pohvalimo ga lahko zaradi dejstva, da je bil tri leta državni prvak v pomnjenju števila π – zapomni si kar 3141 njegovih decimalk! –, bil je tudi državni prvak v pomnjenju. In kadar ne uri možganov, razgibava telo, verjame namreč, da možgani z gibanjem postanejo še bolj skoncentrirani, dovzetni za nove ideje in informacije, zato vozi kontracikl, žonglira, hodi po vrvi, obvlada diabolo in ravnotežno lestev.Na tekmovanja iz pomnjenja se običajno pripravlja približno dva tedna. Na začetku si je v spomin brez težav priklical približno 90 odstotkov decimalk števila pi, nato je le dodajal nove in jih utrjeval. Prepričan je, da ta metoda nima zgornje meje pri količini zapomnjenih številk: »Zgornjo mejo predstavlja le volja posameznika, da to gradi in vadi. Ko sem osvojil tri tisoč številk, je bil moj tempo že 600 decimalk v eni uri. Seveda je potem drugo, da to utrdiš.« Svetovni rekord znaša dobrih 70.000 naučenih mest števila π.
Tablete za pomnjenje ni!


Državni prvak v pomnjenju. FOTO: OSEBNI ARHIV

Že nekajkrat je povedal, da hitra tableta za pomnjenje ne obstaja, zato je začel študirati številne tehnike pomnjenja. Ena bolj preprostih, ko si želimo zapomniti nekaj predmetov (recimo nakupovalni seznam), je tehnika verige: »Ko si želimo nekaj zapomniti, moramo poskrbeti, da bomo to informacijo lahko priklicali, zato moramo imeti do nje neki hakeljček. Tehnika deluje tako, da prvi člen povežemo z drugim z nenavadno, močno asociacijo. Nato na enak način povežemo drugi člen s tretjim in tako naprej dobimo verigo. Ta nam pomaga, da vse prikličemo v spomin. Recimo, da imamo na seznamu najprej brokoli in kuhinjske brisačke. Jaz si predstavljam, kako iz tuša pride velik brokoli, vse je polno pare in se zavije v kuhinjsko brisačko,« živahno pripoveduje Škrlec. Pri tej metodi je pomembno, da je ustvarjena podoba čim bolj drugačna od resničnosti.
Vozi kontracikl, žonglira, hodi po vrvi, obvlada diabolo in ravnotežno lestev.

A TV that remembers 3141 decimal places of the number π (pi)
It usually takes about two weeks to prepare for memory competitions.
02 Nov 2019, 15:38 by D.V.



The work of juggling. PHOTO: PERSONAL ARCHIVE



Actor, presenter ... PHOTO: MMCRTV



Pavel Ravnohrib was cast by the player. PHOTO: RTV SLO



National memory champion. PHOTO: PERSONAL ARCHIVE


Small Gray Cells, the Slovenian television quiz for children and adolescents, has entered its 26th year of broadcast. Until 2016, the show, which is a real hit among young people, was hosted by actor Pavle Ravnohrib, who fell out of favor with the leaders of RTV SLO because of some of his views, most notably engaging in a referendum campaign against the adoption of the Law on Marriage and Family Relations. From the 2016/17 season, the quiz has been directed by playwright Nik Škrlec. This is my first such role, so it will be exciting and certainly exciting for me - I bet on honesty and curious, clear competitors! I love the challenges, the imagination and the knowledge, if I can pass this on to the contestants and spectators, my job is done, "the new leader said at the time, eventually becoming an inspiring teen idol.
He rides a countercycle, juggles, walks the ropes, manages the diabolo and balances the ladder.
It trains the brain and exercises the body


Actor, presenter ... PHOTO: MMCRTV

Nick is from Posavje (Brestanica), is a drama actor and director, and is active on various theater stages. We can praise him for the fact that he was the national champion in memory of π for three years - remember as many as 3141 of his decimals! -, he was also the national memory champion. And when he does not train the brain, he exercises the body, believing that the brain becomes more concentrated with movement, susceptible to new ideas and information, so he rides a countercycle, juggles, walks the rope, masks diabolics and balance ladders. preparing for about two weeks. Initially, he easily recalled about 90 percent of the decimal point of pi, and then just added new ones and consolidated them. He is convinced that this method has no upper limit on the number of memorized numbers: “The upper limit is only the will of the individual to build and practice it. When I won three thousand numbers, my tempo was already 600 decimals in an hour. Of course, the second is to consolidate that. ”The world record is over 70,000 learned places of the number π.
There are no memory pills!


National memory champion. PHOTO: PERSONAL ARCHIVE

He has said several times that a fast pill does not exist, so he began to study many memory techniques. One of the simpler ones when we want to remember a few items (say a shopping list) is a chain technique: “When we want to remember something, we have to make sure that we can retrieve this information, so we have to have a hacker. The technique works by associating the first article with the second with an unusual, strong association. Then, in the same way, we associate the second link with the third link and so we get the chain. This helps us to remember everything. Let's say we have broccoli and kitchen towels on the list first. I imagine big broccoli coming out of the shower, everything is full of steam and wrapped in a kitchen towel, "says Škrlec lively. In this method, it is important that the image created is as different from reality as possible.
He rides the countercycle, juggles, walks the ropes, manages the diabolo and the balance ladder.
